meanings.definition: The activity of sailing in a yacht.
meanings.sent1: Yachting is a fun way to sail on a fancy boat.
meanings.sent2: We went yachting on the calm blue sea last summer.
meanings.sent3: Yachting with friends can lead to great adventures on the water.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were yachting through the clouds, free and weightless.
meanings.sent5: The sun sparkled on the waves as we enjoyed yachting together.

meanings.definition: The sport or pastime of racing or cruising in a yacht.
meanings.sent1: Yachting races require skill and strategy to win.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered as the yachting competition reached its peak.
meanings.sent3: The yachting race was so close, it ended in a tie!
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, yachting through challenges is essential.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of yachting against the wind is unmatched in any other sport.
